Protocols/SideRevealViewControllerDelega.name: sideRevealViewController(_:willReveal:animated:)
Protocols/SideRevealViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when SideRevealViewController is about to switch its state.

Protocols/SideRevealViewControllerDelega.name: SideRevealViewControllerDelegate
Protocols/SideRevealViewControllerDelega.abstract: Set of all callbacks for reveal state switching of SideRevealViewController.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/embed(.name: embed(_:in:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/embed(.abstract: Embeds easily a view controller inside this one. if called multiple time pay attention to call children.forEach { $0.removeFromParent() } when appropriate

Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/r.name: revealWidth
Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/r.abstract: Property that controls how much the front(main) view controller is moved to the side on reveal.

Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/r.name: revealDuration
Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/r.abstract: Property that controls how much time is needed for the front(main) view controller to move fully in order to reveal the side view controller.

Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/r.name: revealDamping
Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/r.abstract: Property that controls the bounciness of the reveal action.

Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/d.name: delegate
Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/d.abstract: Set here object who wants to get notified when reveal state is changing.

Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/s.name: sideController
Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/s.abstract: Property that holds reference to the side controller.

Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/_.name: _sideContainer
Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/_.abstract: Property that holds reference to the side controller’s view container.

Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/f.name: frontController
Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/f.abstract: Property that holds reference to the front controller.

Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/_.name: _frontContainer
Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/_.abstract: Property that holds reference to the front controller’s view container.

Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/f.name: frontContainerCenterXConstraint
Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/f.abstract: NSLayoutConstraint used for the animation of the reveal action.

Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/_.name: _shared
Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/_.abstract: Internal memory location storing the SideRevealViewController for this app.

Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/s.name: sideContainer
Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/s.abstract: UIView in which the side controller’s view gets presented as a child.

Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/l.name: loadSideFrom(_:)
Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/l.abstract: Use this method to load the side view controller, that will get revealed on reveal action.

Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/f.name: frontContainer
Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/f.abstract: UIView in which the front(main) controller’s view gets presented as a child.

Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/l.name: loadFrontFrom(_:)
Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/l.abstract: Use this method to load the front(main) view controller, that will get revealed on reveal action.

Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/i.name: isRevealed
Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/i.abstract: Gives info whether the SideRevealViewController is currently in ‘revealed’ state.

Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/t.name: toggleReveal()
Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/t.abstract: Switches the current instance between ‘reveal’ and ‘normal’ state.

Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/r.name: revealSide(_:animated:)
Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/r.abstract: Use this method to reveal or hide the side view controller.

Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/r.name: revealSide(_:)
Classes/SideRevealViewController.html#/r.abstract: Method used internally to reveal or hide the side view controller.

Classes/FrontRevealSegue.html#/identifie.name: identifier
Classes/FrontRevealSegue.html#/identifie.abstract: The identifier that has to be set to this segue,

Classes/SideRevealSegue.html#/identifier.name: identifier
Classes/SideRevealSegue.html#/identifier.abstract: The identifier that has to be set to this segue,

Classes/SideRevealSegue.html.name: SideRevealSegue
Classes/SideRevealSegue.html.abstract: Relationship Segue, used to set the side view controller of SideRevealViewController.

Classes/FrontRevealSegue.html.name: FrontRevealSegue
Classes/FrontRevealSegue.html.abstract: Relationship Segue, used to set the front(main) view controller of SideRevealViewController.

Classes/SideRevealViewController.html.name: SideRevealViewController
Classes/SideRevealViewController.html.abstract: UIViewController that is handling the reveal of view controller behind another one.
